div.p: ONLINE USER 1: How am I supposed to have a good time? Three beers and out? No way.
ONLINE USER 2: Hmm, I know a lot of people who drink way more than those guidelines.
ONLINE USER 3: Umm.. I don't think those guidelines are meant for people like me, who like to have a good time, you can't have any fun.
ONLINE USER 4: I drink more than that and I feel fine. I'm kinda surprised.
